DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of olmesartan medoxomil compared with losartan potassium in patients with mild to moderate essential hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Olmesartan Medoxomil Versus Losartan Potassium in Patients With Mild to Moderate Essential Hypertension
